issue.title: [CF 207] want an icon displayed to indicate health thresholds.
issue.body:
Please implement health testing so that an icon can be displayed when a unit reaches a certain health threshold.

This would primarily be helpful for classes that have an "execute" range spell that does not provide other indicators of when to execute.  (I'm specifically thinking of assassination spec'd rogues here.)

It would also be helpful to track target phase transitions that are health level dependent (Boss gains "Uncomfortable Smell" at 75% health: an indicator when the boss is between 75%-80% could be displayed as a warning to put on a gas-mask.)


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry | Imported from CurseForge issue #207 | Raw
